name: Cave Drake
description: The Cave Drake is a large dragon with a powerful build, adapted to life in subterranean environments. It features a stealthy form capable of blending into rocky terrain.
memorable: Its blinding spit ability can incapacitate foes, making it a dangerous encounter in close quarters.
goals: Typically seeks to ambush prey and defend its territory in caves or underground lairs.
relations: May be found alongside other subterranean creatures, often in conflict with rival predators.
environment: Commonly inhabits caves, tunnels, and other dark, rocky places.
strengths: Has strong melee combat abilities, enhanced stealth, and ambush tactics.
weaknesses: Low intelligence can limit strategic decision-making in complex encounters.
attacks: Can bite for piercing damage and claw for slashing damage, with a powerful blinding spit attack.
most_powerful_ability: Blinding Spit can poison and blind targets, greatly hindering their combat effectiveness.
senses: Possesses keen smell, allowing it to notice foes more easily through scent.
skills: Excels in stealth, making it a proficient ambusher in its rocky habitat.
additional_information: Damage immunity to poison and immunity to the poisoned condition.
Gains advantage on attack rolls against surprised creatures.
Can climb without difficulty, even upside down.
Advantage on stealth checks in rocky terrain.
test_queries: ambushing dragon that uses blinding spit
dragon known for keen smell and climbing
